node.title: PlayAsia’s Obake PAM Is the EN Voice for Azure Striker Gunvolt 3’s Lola
node.description: If she's not doing her CEO duties, PlayAsia's CEOTuber Obake PAM does other roles. This time, it was announced that she is the English voice of Lola from INTI Creatives' Azure Striker Gunvolt 3.
